title: 1964 Type 2 splitscreen - LHD - Kombi walk through - SOLD

posts.content:
Hi Alex and Amy,

Lovely to hear from you. I hope you are having lots of fun in Arabella. Certainly wasn't the same driving around Norfolk in a Peugeot Partner!

I hope Arabella is behaving.

Cheers,
Darren.

She certainly is, we have a shiny new stainless steel exhaust now thanks to driver error tearing the old one off - nasty, nasty speedbumps did it.
If you’re interested and on Instagram you can find a dedicated page @63splitty
Hope you’re well any Darren, do reach out if you want to see her again.
Alex
